text: The 2019 Internazionali di Tennis di Manerbio – Trofeo Dimmidisì was a professional tennis tournament played on clay courts. It was the seventeenth edition of the tournament which was part of the 2019 ATP Challenger Tour. It took place in Manerbio, Italy between 5 and 11 August 2019. ==Singles main draw entrants== ===Seeds=== {|class="sortable wikitable" |- ! width="70"| Country ! width="175"| Player ! Rank1 ! Seed |- | |Paolo Lorenzi |114 |1 |- | |Lorenzo Giustino |131 |2 |- | |Kimmer Coppejans |133 |3 |- | |Federico Coria |165 |4 |- | |Federico Gaio |175 |5 |- | ~~~~| ~~Nikola Milojević~~ | ~~180~~ | ~~6~~ |- | |Viktor Galović |221 |7 |- | |Andrea Arnaboldi |225 |8 |- | |Mohamed Safwat |235 |9 |- | |Gonçalo Oliveira |251 |10 |- | |Nino Serdarušić |269 |11 |- | |Frederico Ferreira Silva |273 |12 |- | |Pavel Kotov |287 |13 |- | |Evan King |301 |14 |- | |Alejandro Tabilo |304 |15 |- | |Andrea Collarini |305 |16 |} * 1 Rankings are as of 29 July 2019. ===Other Entrants=== The following players received wildcards into the singles main draw: * Gabriele Bosio * Viktor Galović * Holger Vitus Nødskov Rune * Filippo Speziali * Samuel Vincent Ruggeri The following players received entry into the singles main draw using protected rankings: * Nicolás Barrientos * Íñigo Cervantes The following players received entry into the singles main draw as using their ITF World Tennis Ranking: * Francisco Cerúndolo * Sadio Doumbia * Tomás Martín Etcheverry * Ivan Gakhov * Botic van de Zandschulp The following players received entry from the qualifying draw: * Marco Bortolotti * Fabien Reboul The following player received entry as a lucky loser: * Nikola Čačić ==Champions== ===Singles=== * Federico Gaio def. Paolo Lorenzi 6–3, 6–1. ===Doubles=== * Fabrício Neis / Fernando Romboli def. Sadio Doumbia / Fabien Reboul 6–4, 7–6(7–4). ==References== Internazionali di Tennis di Manerbio - Trofeo Dimmidisì 2019 Category:2019 in Italian sport Category:August 2019 sports events in Italy
title: 2019 Internazionali di Tennis di Manerbio – Trofeo Dimmidisì
